work_experience.role: AI Scientist – Generative Insights & Clustering Specialist
work_experience.description:
Engineered a robust NLP data pipeline leveraging the GPT-4o mini API for PII reduction and data cleaning, combined
with intfloat/e5 embeddings in Weaviate to enable advanced clustering with <2% noise.
Developed a hybrid geospatial visualization system using ArcGIS Pro and Deck.gl to create interactive maps of com-
plex cluster relationships and topological data.
Fine-tuned generative AI models to analyze, summarize, and synthesize multi-source corporate data (tickets, emails,
meetings) into actionable summaries and recommendations.

AI Proctoring System: Developed a frontend-based AI proctoring solution using TensorFlow.js and WebGPU, enabling
real-time, serverless monitoring for thousands of users and cutting infrastructure costs.

Developed a facial recognition system using Siamese Neural Networks for a B2B AI-driven interview platform, enabling
one-shot image recognition and improving performance with data augmentation.

projects.name: GenAgent-Personalized-Career-Assistant-Powered-by-Agentic-AI
projects.description:
Architected a full-stack AI career assistant (FastAPI, Streamlit) providing data-driven resume feedback and job appli-
cation tools.
Engineered a multi-feature platform using LLM agents (GPT-4) for resume analysis, rewriting, and cover letter gener-
ation.
Containerized the application using Docker, ensuring reproducible builds and simplifying deployment.

projects.name: AI Medical Chatbot Using Llama 2
projects.description:
Engineered a RAG medical chatbot using Llama 2 and LangChain to provide accurate answers from a PDF knowledge
base.
Implemented a FAISS vector database, achieving 95% retrieval accuracy and reducing response latency by 50%.

projects.name: AI Large-Scale Candidate Recommendation System
projects.description:
Developed a scalable candidate-job matching system using GPT-4o mini and advanced prompt engineering.
Built a resume parsing pipeline to minimize input size, reducing inference cost and time.

publications.name: EduNote: AI-Powered Cultural and Location-Based Note Generation from Images
publications.description:
Developed an AI tool to transform images of landmarks into travel notes using a fine-tuned DenseNet121 model and
APIs (Wikipedia, TripAdvisor).
Achieved 88.83% classification accuracy and a 0.91 F1-score on 20 Indian monuments by optimizing the model and
using LLaMA3-70B for text generation.
